title: Agent Request Message
description: A request message from a Desktop Agent to the Bridge.

type.title: Request Message type
type.description: Identifies the type of the message and it is typically set to the FDC3 function name that the message relates to, e.g. 'findIntent', with 'Request' appended.

payload.title: Message payload
payload.description: The message payload typically contains the arguments to FDC3 API functions.

AgentRequestMeta.title: Agent Request Metadata
AgentRequestMeta.description: Metadata for a request message sent by Desktop Agents to the Bridge.

source.title: Source identifier
source.description: Field that represents the source application that the request was received from, or the source Desktop Agent if it issued the request itself.

destination.title: Destination identifier
destination.description: Optional field that represents the destination that the request should be routed to. Must be set by the Desktop Agent for API calls that include a target app parameter and must include the name of the Desktop Agent hosting the target application.
